name: 10 Seconds to draw that picture
description:
This small game is part of the course "Game a Week". As the name suggests I made this in a week. The objective is to replicate the picture shown by clicking the pixels to change them between black and white - but you only have 10 Seconds to do so!

Made by: Benjamin Rose

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe.

Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai
"Game a Week"  (WinterSemester 2019/20)
